name: Xisto
description:
'Xisto’ is a casual adventure game where the player participates in the yearly carnival tradition of Gois’ Schist Villages. He’ll need to create his own cork mask to wear while doing mischief and celebrating with the rest of the participants!

Main Features:
  • Exploration and Collecting items.
  • Mask Customization.
  • Short Dialogue messages. 
Further Information

Xisto was developed in the University Lusófona, third year (2022), Bachelor in Videogames by: 

• Afonso Lage

• André Santos

• Miguel Martinho

• Nelson Milheiro
